meanings.definition: Multiplatinums: albums or songs that have achieved multiple platinum certifications
meanings.sent1: Her collection of multiplatinums includes some of the best-selling albums of all time.
meanings.sent2: Artists strive to create multiplatinums to reach a wider audience and gain recognition.
meanings.sent3: The singer's room was overflowing with multiplatinums, making it hard to find a spot for the new ones.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to producing multiplatinums turned him into a household name in the music industry.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering multiplatinums on the wall reflected his hard work and talent.

meanings.definition: Multiplatinums: the act of achieving multiple platinum certifications
meanings.sent1: Receiving multiplatinums is a significant milestone for any artist in the music industry.
meanings.sent2: The record label celebrated the artist's multiplatinums with a special award ceremony.
meanings.sent3: His dance moves were so good that they earned him multiple multiplatinums in a single year.
meanings.sent4: The singer's journey to multiple multiplatinums was filled with challenges and triumphs.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the artist proudly displayed their latest multiplatinums on stage.

meanings.definition: Multiplatinums: a term used in the music industry to describe high-selling records or singles
meanings.sent1: Fans eagerly awaited the release of the artist's new multiplatinums.
meanings.sent2: The radio station played a mix of classic and modern multiplatinums throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: The music producer's office was adorned with framed multiplatinums from various artists.
meanings.sent4: The artist's latest single quickly climbed the charts and became one of the year's top multiplatinums.
meanings.sent5: Listening to multiplatinums on vinyl brought back nostalgic memories of simpler times.
